properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1 v8 c1 v9 c1 v10 c1 v11 c1 v12 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yerooshalemu nehovaaye kattu chunna vaadani Ishraayeleeyulanu pogucheyu vaadani{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Gunde chedarina vaarini baagu cheyu vaadani Vaari gayamu lanniyu kattu chunna vaadani{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nakshatramula sankyanu aayana niyaminchenu Vaati kanniyu perulu pettu chunna vaadani{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prabhuvu goppa vaadunu adhika shakhti sampannudu Jnaanamunaku aayane mithiyuleni vaadani{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Deenulaku andaayane bhakhti heenula goolchunu Sitaaraatho devuni stutulatho keertinchudi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aayana aakaashamu meghamulatho kappuchu Bhoomi koraku varshamu sidda parachu vaadani{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Parvathamulalo gaddini pashuvulaku molipinchunu Arachu pilla kaakulakunu aahaaramu thaaneeyunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Gurramula narulandali balamu naanandinchadu Krupaku vedu vaarilo santhasinchu vaadani{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yerooshalemaa yehovaanu siyonu nee devuni Keertinchumu koni yaadumu aanandinchu vaadani{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Pillala naasheervadinchiyu bala parache nee gummamul Manchi godhuma pantatho ninnu thruptiga nunchunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bhoomiki thana yaajnanu itchu vaadu aayane Vegamuganu devuni vaakyamu parugethunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vaakyamu yaakobuku theliya jesina vaadani Ye janamu keelaaguna chesi yundaledani{/lang-eng}
